ComicInfo.Title: Battered & Bruced, Part Three: From These Ashes
ComicInfo.Summary:
The cross-over no one asked for -- or expected -- continues! Too big for the movie of television screen, Dynamite presents the ultimate "Why Not? tale as Ash and Army of Darkness meets Xena, the Warrior Princess in the second issue of this 4-part mini series event!
The case of mistake identity gone horribly wrong continues as Xena and Gabrielle finds themselves caught up in the insanity that follows Ash wherever he goes while the main man himself finally bumps into Autolycus! When these two idiots meet, there's bound to be a fight! Plus: the fairies make their move!
Writer John (Marvel Zombies vs. the Army of Darkness) is joined by artist Miguel Montenegro and cover artists UDON Studios and Fabiano Neves!
